category.name: wbb.thread
category.item: You have not enough {JCOINS_NAME}. The cost for pushing is {#$threadPushJCoins} {JCOINS_NAME}.

category.name: wcf.jcoins.statement
category.item: You have pushed {if $statement->getObject()->threadID}your thread “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}”.{else]a thread of yours, which was deleted in the meantime.{/if}
